org.openintents.tools.simulator.controller.sensor

类 SensorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openintents.tools.simulator.controller.sensor.SensorController
  • 直接已知子类:
    AccelerometerController, BarcodeReaderController, GravityController, GyroscopeController, LightController, LinearAccelerationController, MagneticFieldController, OrientationController, PressureController, ProximityController, RotationVectorController, TemperatureController

    public abstract class SensorController
extends java.lang.Object
    SensorController is the class that defines the common fields and methods for sensors. It also contains abstract methods for sensor specific actions that need to be implemented for each sensor, regarding their behaviour (listeners, etc.)
    作者:
    ilarele

        public abstract void updateSensorPhysics(OrientationModel orientation,
                                         WiiAccelerometerModel realDeviceBridgeAddon,
                                         int delay)
        Updates model using view data (computes sensor internal variables). It is call on each iteration for sensor updates.
        参数:
        orientation -
        realDeviceBridgeAddon -
        delay -
